# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `stroke`
* Variable label: `Stroke`
* Variable description: `Diagnosis of stroke or cerebral vascular disease since the last wave`
* Domain: `Diseases`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | NOT A stroke (cerebral vascular disease) 
1        | A stroke (cerebral vascular disease)

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

* Short name: `stroke_age`
* Variable label: `Age of each episode of stroke`
* Variable description: `Age of each episode of stroke`
* Domain: `Diseases`
* Value type: `Continuous`
* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing


<!-- ########################################################## --> 
<!-- # Global variables -->
```{r global, include=FALSE, echo=F}
miss_values_vector <- c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999)
ds_label <- "Stroke"
ds_label_age <- "Age of each episode of stroke"
cat_label <- c("No" = 0, "Yes" = 1, "Missing" = 999, "Do not know" = 998, "Refuse" = 997, "Not applicable" = 996, "Does not answer" = 995, "Not attempt not done" = 994, "Disable to measure" = 993, "Impute" = 992, "CAPI interviewer error" = 991)
cont_label <- cat_label[3:11]
datafolder <- "../RData/"
#sing_idlist <- c()
```

# Data process



## Australia


### Wave 1


#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `MORBID34` |`DIAGYR34`|`ybirth`|
|-|-|-|-|
| **Label** | `Stroke` |`Year of diagnosis: Stroke`|`Year of birth`|
| **Table name**  | `ALSA-Wave1` | `ALSA-Wave1` |`ybirth`|
| **Categories** | `0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes` | `continuous` | `continuous` |
| **Missings** |  | `NA` |   |
| **Description** |  |  |  |

```{r assign w1, echo=F}

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'ALSA_w1','ALSA.ALSA-Wave1',variables=list('MORBID34','DIAGYR34'), missings = T)
ALSA_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'ALSA_w1')
load(paste0(datafolder,"w1/ybirth.RData"))
ALSA_w1 <- left_join(ALSA_w1,ybirth, by="id")

```

```{r local w1, echo=F}

vbl <- ALSA_w1$MORBID34
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = names(ALSA_w1)[2])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(ALSA_w1, aes(x=factor(MORBID34))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- ALSA_w1$DIAGYR34
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = names(ALSA_w1)[3])
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ALSA_w1, aes(DIAGYR34)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(1915,1995)

vbl <- ALSA_w1$ybirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(ALSA_w1)[4])
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ALSA_w1, aes(ybirth)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(1885,1930)

```


#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `stroke` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `keep up 0 into 0`
* `keep up 1 into 1`

To compute `stroke_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if stroke == 1, stroke_age = DIAGYR34 - ybirth`
* `if stroke == 0, stroke_age = 996`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w1}

# Categorical variable harmonization
ALSA_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=ALSA_w1$id)
ALSA_ds_w1$stroke <- car::recode(ALSA_w1$MORBID34, "NA = 999")

# Continuous variable harmonization
stroke_age <- ALSA_w1$DIAGYR34[which(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke == 1)]-ALSA_w1$ybirth[which(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke == 1)]
ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age <- car::recode(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke, "0 = 996; 1 = stroke_age")
ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age <- car::recode(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age,"NA=999")

```


#### Statistics of the new harmonized variable

```{r descript w1, echo=F}

vbl <- ALSA_ds_w1$stroke
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(ALSA_ds_w1, aes(x=factor(stroke))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label_age)
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ALSA_ds_w1, aes(stroke_age)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label_age) + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(5,95)

```


#### Validation

```{r crosstabulation w1, echo=F}

continuous <- c(sum(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age==996,na.rm=T),sum(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age!=996,na.rm=T))
X <- table(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke, useNA = "ifany")
dichotomous <- c(X[1],sum(X[2:3],na.rm=T))
C <- rbind(continuous,dichotomous)
colnames(C) <- c("0<-->996","1<-->(possibly missing) age of diagnostic")
kable(C,caption = "Continuous vs Dichotomous")

```

### Wave 6


#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `CDN59_W6` |`DIA59_W6`|`ybirth`|
|-|-|-|-|
| **Label** | `stroke or CVA` |`year told of stroke or CVA`|`Year of birth`|
| **Table name**  | `ALSA-Wave6` | `ALSA-Wave6` |`ybirth`|
| **Categories** | `0 = no`<br/>`1 = yes` |`continuous`|`continuous`|
| **Missings** | `NA` |`NA`|  |
| **Description** |  |  |  |

```{r assign w6, echo=F}

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'ALSA_w6','ALSA.ALSA-Wave6',variables=list('CDN59_W6','DIA59_W6'), missings = T)
ALSA_w6 <- opal.execute(o,'ALSA_w6')
ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6 <- as.numeric(ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6)
load(paste0(datafolder,"w6/ybirth.RData"))
ALSA_w6 <- left_join(ALSA_w6,ybirth, by="id")

```

```{r local w6, echo=F}

vbl <- ALSA_w6$CDN59_W6
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = names(ALSA_w6)[2])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(ALSA_w6, aes(x=factor(CDN59_W6))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = names(ALSA_w6)[3])
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ALSA_w6, aes(DIA59_W6)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(1975,2005)

vbl <- ALSA_w6$ybirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(ALSA_w6)[4])
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ALSA_w6, aes(ybirth)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(1895,1930)

```


#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `stroke` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `keep up 0 into 0`
* `keep up 1, ensuring it does not correspond to previous waves, into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `stroke_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if stroke == 1, stroke_age = DIA59_W6 - ybirth`
* `if stroke == 0, stroke_age = 996`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w6}

ALSA_w6 <- left_join(ALSA_w6,ALSA_w1, by="id",suffix=c("","_w1"))
ALSA_w6 <- left_join(ALSA_w6,ALSA_w3, by="id")

ALSA_ds_w6 <- tibble(id=ALSA_w6$id)
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke <- rep(999,length(ALSA_w6$id))
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke[which(ALSA_w6$CDN59_W6==0)] <- 0
# Individuals having stroke since wave 3, so their year of diagnostic is at least 1994 or missing but until later previous wave interviewed they had no stroke.
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke[which(ALSA_w6$CDN59_W6==1 & (ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6>=1994 | ALSA_w6$W1CDN34==2 | (is.na(ALSA_w6$W1CDN34) & ALSA_w6$MORBID34==0)))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age <- rep(999,length(ALSA_w6$id))
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age[which(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke==0)] <- 996
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age[which(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke==1 & ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6>=1994)] <- ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6[which(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke == 1 & ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6>=1994)] - ALSA_w6$ybirth[which(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke == 1 & ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6>=1994)]
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age <- car::recode(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age,"NA=999")

```


#### Statistics of the new harmonized variable

```{r descript w6, echo=F}

vbl <- ALSA_ds_w6$stroke
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(ALSA_ds_w6, aes(x=factor(stroke))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label_age)
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(ALSA_ds_w6, aes(stroke_age)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label_age) + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(70,95)

```


#### Validation

```{r crosstabulation w6, echo=F, results='asis'}

AfterH <- table(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke)
BeforeH <- table(ALSA_w6$CDN59_W6, useNA = "ifany")
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("1->1","NA->999")
kable(C)

cat("There are two individuals which in the first wave told they had no stroke, in the third wave were missings and in the sixth wave, together with a third individual told they had stroke and give year of diagnosis previous to first wave. We harmonize them as having stroke but keep missing ages of diagnosis ")
kable(ALSA_w6[which(ALSA_w6$DIA59_W6<1994),], align = 'c')
```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

Two tables are generated: 

1. Percentages of categories in each harmonised variable.

2. Frequencies and percentages of individuals with different trajectories. To avoid too large table, Only trajectories with percentages larger than 0.3 are shown.

**R script:**

```{r summ}
ALSA_ds_w1$stroke <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke, labels = cat_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke) <- ds_label
ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age, labels = cont_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke_age) <- ds_label_age
ALSA_ds_w3$stroke <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w3$stroke, labels = cat_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w3$stroke) <- ds_label
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke, labels = cat_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke) <- ds_label
ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age, labels = cont_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke_age) <- ds_label_age
ALSA_ds_w11$stroke <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w11$stroke, labels = cat_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w11$stroke) <- ds_label
ALSA_ds_w12$stroke <- labelled(ALSA_ds_w12$stroke, labels = cat_label)
label(ALSA_ds_w12$stroke) <- ds_label

ALSA_m_ds_w1 <- ALSA_ds_w1
ALSA_m_ds_w1$stroke <- car::recode(ALSA_m_ds_w1$stroke, "miss_values_vector=NA")
ALSA_m_ds_w3 <- ALSA_ds_w3
ALSA_m_ds_w3$stroke <- car::recode(ALSA_m_ds_w3$stroke, "miss_values_vector=NA")
ALSA_m_ds_w6 <- ALSA_ds_w6
ALSA_m_ds_w6$stroke <- car::recode(ALSA_m_ds_w6$stroke, "miss_values_vector=NA")
ALSA_m_ds_w11 <- ALSA_ds_w11
ALSA_m_ds_w11$stroke <- car::recode(ALSA_m_ds_w11$stroke, "miss_values_vector=NA")
ALSA_m_ds_w12 <- ALSA_ds_w12
ALSA_m_ds_w12$stroke <- car::recode(ALSA_m_ds_w12$stroke, "miss_values_vector=NA")

tt <-    frq(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke)[[1]][,c(1:2,4)]
tt[4] <- frq(ALSA_ds_w3$stroke)[[1]][,c(4)]
tt[5] <- frq(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke)[[1]][,c(4)]
tt[6] <- frq(ALSA_ds_w11$stroke)[[1]][,c(4)]
tt[7] <- frq(ALSA_ds_w12$stroke)[[1]][,c(4)]
tt[13,] <- c("n", "sample size", 
             length(ALSA_ds_w1$stroke), length(ALSA_ds_w3$stroke), length(ALSA_ds_w6$stroke), 
             length(ALSA_ds_w11$stroke), length(ALSA_ds_w12$stroke)
             )
names(tt)<-c("val", "label", "w1", "w3", "w6", "w11", "w12")
kable(tt)

dbb <- merge(ALSA_m_ds_w1[,c("id","stroke")], ALSA_m_ds_w3[,c("id","stroke")], by="id", suffixes = c(".w1",".w3"), all=T)
dbb <- merge(dbb, ALSA_m_ds_w6[,c("id","stroke")], by="id", all=T)
dbb <- merge(dbb, ALSA_m_ds_w11[,c("id","stroke")], by="id", suffixes = c(".w6",".w11"), all=T)
dbb <- merge(dbb, ALSA_m_ds_w12[,c("id","stroke")], by="id", all=T)
names(dbb) <- c("id", "w1", "w3", "w6", "w11", "w12")
v.dbb <- paste(dbb[,2],dbb[,3],dbb[,4],dbb[,5],dbb[,6],sep="")
f.dbb <- frq(v.dbb)[[1]][,c(1,2,4)]
kable(f.dbb[f.dbb[,3]>=0.3,])
```
